items.title: Russia's deadliest attack on Kyiv for months flattens part of apartment block
items.description: Ukrainian officials say a drone smashed into the building, leaving a number of people dead and wounded.

items.title: Israeli forces kill 51 Palestinians waiting for flour at Gaza aid site, witnesses and rescuers say
items.description: It is potentially the deadliest of the almost daily shootings that have been taking place recently near aid distribution sites.

items.title: 'I want to get home': Thousands of Britons trapped in Israel as conflict with Iran rages
items.description: Since the conflict with Iran broke out, Israel's airspace has been closed and all flights suspended

items.title: G7 leaders urge 'de-escalation' but stop short of calling for Israel-Iran ceasefire
items.description: The joint statement was signed by America's President Trump - who then left the summit in Canada early.

items.title: Colombian senator in 'extremely critical condition' after being shot
items.description: The presidential hopeful was badly injured in a targeted attack on 7 June.
